body_html:
The issue is not fixed apparently. Only Conv3DTranposed seems to be fixed, but the last nightly build still provides the same error with tf.layers.conv3d.

Can someone confirm the bug and reopen the issue?

The trick in the initial post solves the issue.

body:
The issue is **not** fixed apparently. Only Conv3DTranposed seems to be fixed, but the last nightly build still provides the same error with tf.layers.conv3d.

Can someone confirm the bug and reopen the issue?

The trick in the initial post solves the issue.
